ygData.subject: Re: level 20+ warriors?
ygData.msgSnippet: 85, I fight with a druid on a very regular basis, with str items and buffs I m 117, or maybe its 112 come to think of it....I ll have to look. Without buffs
ygData.messageBody:
85, I fight with a druid on a very regular basis, with str items and buffs I'm 117, or maybe its 112 come to think of it....I'll have to look.

Without buffs on, my top 4 stats are all high 90s. I don't have any single huge stat, but I'm well rounded :)

Salr D'Taynkk
Dark Warrior of The Kith
Veeshan

>>> "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...> 5.18.99 7:59:42 PM >>>
From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>

whats is your base str Salr??

Jaade,
Indigo Sista Soldier.


> ----------
> From: Jason Coan[SMTP:COANJ@...]

> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] level 20+ warriors?
>
> From: "Jason Coan" <COANJ@...>
>
> My damage went for 29 to 35 when I hit 20th lvl, but I had a BBC at the
> time and I think the BBC is gimped below 20th....but now that I'm 27th, I
> hit for 42 with the same BBC....seems pretty consistant for me, every
> level I get an extra point of damage woohoo.
>
> Salr D'Taynkk
> Dark Warrior of The Kith
> Veeshan
>
> >>> "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...> 5.18.99 2:40:14 AM >>>
> From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>
>
> Could any level 20+ warriors tell me if the extra damage per level works?
> If
> so how much more damage are you doing with the same weapon than you did at
> level 19 and what your strength is?
>
> Just curious. Thanks.
